section.title: sale types creating new Sale Types
section.para: Sale types are used to distinguish one kind of sale from another, for reporting purposes. They also impact sales accounting, as they appear as one of the account assignment options on the Sales Assignments screen. To access the master list of sale types, go to Sales > Setup. In the Setup window, from the left side menu, select Master Information > Sale Types. The following screen will appear:
The Sale Types screen displays information on all existing sale types, including sale type code, active status, default status, and description.
